text: of all the things that they need of
course food medicine shelter but for
children play is the most healing
therapy so this is the hard surface
street ball and if the car drives over
it it'll it can be flattened and Riaan
plate itself it just plays on and on it
doesn't oxidize it doesn't absorb the
water or the dirt it washes right off it
can withstand years of punctures and
abuse and rough surfaces while watching
television in 2006 I saw this
heartbreaking you know gut-wrenching
news story about the plight of children
in gar fur they were playing soccer on
dirt with a ball they'd made by tying
trash together with twine I remembered
that I had come across this interesting
material years before I met the people
that developed it they'd even developed
things like shoes and things like that
out of this material at the moment
though in 2006 we were there was no
financial possibility of me pursuing the
research and development almost for 10
years now I've been very fortunate among
other things to have become part of the
production team for the rain forest
concert at Carnegie Hall the rain forest
foundation being founded by sting and
Trudie Styler his wife sting really
wasn't in the mood to talk about music
that day we were talking about our
children start talking about Darfur
challenges in the world and he mentions
that some friends of his because they
know how important it is for children in
war zones and refugee camps to have some
place to play they had just invested
money to build a soccer pitch in Gaza
Tim and I were chatting and he mentioned
this idea for an indestructible soccer
ball a bowler would never wear out never
go flat never need a pump so even on the
harshest of terrain and in the worst of
conditions the ball could survive and
the kids could still play and he just
stopped and he was like what did you say
are you telling me that you know how to
make a ball that will never go flat I
said well I think I know you know see
well why haven't you done that I said
well you know we have another
where our finances are tied up and I
really you know we just don't have the
resources to to experiment you basically
said I have seen what children play with
and this is too important you have to do
it now and if you will I will pay for it
the way it works is very simple
everyone will Football purchased a
second Bowl is donated to the deserving
youth the goal of the One World Football
project is to distribute indestructible
soccer balls wherever they're needed for
children play is the most healing
therapy there is no language there's no
psychosocial therapy that works like the
place
